Headline: #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/74th Place
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland, X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near Ashland/74th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 74th, Damen, 76th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/74th Place.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th and #48 South Damen Temporary Reroute near 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 47 47th and 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Hoyne, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th and #48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Hoyne, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Westbound #47 47th buses will operate via 47th, Damen, 51st, Western, 47th and over regular route.

Northbound #48 Damen buses will operate via Damen, 51st, Western and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near 74th/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temp rerouted via Ashland, 71st, Loomis and 74th, then resume their normal route: due to street blockage near 74th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 71st, Loomis and 74th, then resume their normal route: due to street blockage near 74th/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Line Service Delayed at Francisco
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a door problem.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a door problem. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
